text: The Adirondack Phantoms are an American professional ice hockey team that began playing in 2009. They currently play in the American Hockey League and are the farm team of the Philadelphia Flyers of the NHL. They play their home games in Glens Falls, New York at the Glens Falls Civic Center. Their ECHL affiliate team is the Greenville Road Warriors. ==Other websites== *Adirondack Phantoms Official Site Category:American Hockey League teams Category:Ice hockey teams in the United States Category:Philadelphia Flyers Category:2009 establishments in the United States Category:2000s establishments in Pennsylvania
title: Adirondack Phantoms
